name: Otaku Simulator
description:
Otaku Simulator started on 2019 as fan game of Yandere Simulator but slowly take different direction

Otaku Simulator take place at Sakura High School, you play the role of Asuka, an older bully who is alone now, far from others. She has 8 enemies who want to destroy her reputation for all bad things she do in middle school.

Your objective is to eliminate theirs ennemies and protect your reputation in making friends, do activites, study in class. 

You're an older bully so you evil face can be return 

The game is in development and i will update, if you find a bug, i try to fix it 

Thanks you for viewing my page
